message_1: A school has 350 students. In an exam, 70% of the students passed. How many students passed the exam?
message_2:
To find out how many students passed the exam, we need to calculate 70% of 350 students.

To do this, we can use the formula:

Number of students passed = (Percentage of students passed / 100) * Total number of students

Number of students passed = (70 / 100) * 350

Number of students passed = 0.7 * 350

Number of students passed = 245

So, 245 students passed the exam.
